description:
Dashboard for Micrometer(Java, Spring Boot, Actuator,prometheus)
spring boot -->prometheus-->grafana

targets.expr:
sum by (service) (rate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{instance="$instance", status!~"5.."}[5m]))/
sum by (service) (rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{instance="$instance", status!~"5.."}[5m]))
sum by (service) (jvm_memory_used_bytes{instance="$instance", area="heap"})*100/ sum by (service) (jvm_memory_max_bytes{instance="$instance", area="heap"})

sum by (service)(jvm_memory_used_bytes{instance="$instance", area="nonheap"}) *100/
sum by (service)(jvm_memory_max_bytes{instance="$instance", area="nonheap"})

title: JVM Overview
